title: Novelty attachment for childrens school bags

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a novelty attachment for childrens school bags, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a top plan view of a novelty attachment for childrens school bags showing my new design;
FIG. 2 is a bottom plan view thereof;
FIG. 3 is a left side elevational view thereof;
FIG. 4 is a right side elevational thereof;
FIG. 5 is a front elevational view thereof; and,
FIG. 6 is a rear elevational view thereof.
